result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason Donald Hon was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Jason Donald Hon is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Jason Donald Hon was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Columbia County Court Conviction DNA - DNA taken
Columbia County Court Conviction DNA - DNA taken
Deferred Prosecution Agreement filed.
filed by Atty.Tristan Eagon
filed by Atty.Tristan Eagon

Defendant Jason Donald Hon in court with attorney Tristan F Eagon.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court went over the rights & elements. Defendant pled no contest to count 2, without enhancer. Court found defendant guilty, entered judgment, sentence: $579 fine, 60 days to pay fine or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts. Submit DNA sample. No jail credit. Count 1 dismissed.

Attorney Tristan F. Eagon appeared.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Motion to Reconsider filed in 12 CM 97; Attorney Eagon had no further argument; State had no further argument.  Court granted request; reversed the prior decision.  Case is to be reopened and closed with original pleas.  Court granted the expungement request of defendant.  11:36/11:47  -  Note:  Motion did not apply to 15 CM 691
Return date on January 23, 2017 at 02:45 pm.
Motion hearing on November 8, 2016 at 11:30 am.  - the motion to reconsider was filed in 12 CM 97 - this case is tracking with 12 CM 97

Discussion related to expungement of case no:  12 CM 97, which was reopened.  Pretrial and return date to be set in both cases.  2:15

Defendant Jason Donald Hon in court with attorney Tristan F Eagon.  Christine Marie Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Eagon requested this matter be reset to track with his other case on the 19th at 1:30.  Court approved.
